description.part1: Get to know your dog the best you can and give them a home they deserve.
description.part2: Our website lets you identify over 100+ breeds of doggos and gives you up to date information about them.

invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload an image (JPG, PNG).
failedToCrop: Failed to crop image. Please try again.
lowConfidence: Low confidence in prediction. Please try a clearer image.
connectError: Failed to connect to the prediction service. Check console for details.
selectImageFirst: Please select an image file first.
faq1Answer: Pawdentify is an AI-powered dog breed identification app that helps you identify your dog's breed by uploading a photo.
faq2Question: How accurate is the breed prediction?
faq2Answer: Our AI model provides high accuracy predictions, but results may vary based on image quality and clarity. For best results, upload clear, well-lit photos of your dog's face.
faq3Answer: Currently, you can upload one photo at a time for prediction. We're working on batch processing features for future updates.
faq4Answer: We support common image formats including JPG, PNG, and JPEG. Make sure your image is under 10MB in size.
faq5Answer: Yes, we take privacy seriously. Uploaded images are processed securely and not stored permanently on our servers.
doFaceFocus: Focus on the dog's face and head
doGoodLighting: Ensure good lighting and avoid shadows
doSingleDog: Upload photos of a single dog only
doFrontView: Prefer front or side view of the dog
dontBlurry: Don't use blurry or out-of-focus images
dontDark: Don't use dark or poorly lit photos
dontMultipleDogs: Don't include multiple dogs in one photo
dontObstructed: Don't upload photos where the dog's face is obstructed
dontSmallImage: Don't use very small or low-resolution images
guidelinesNote: Following these guidelines will help our AI provide more accurate breed predictions.
